articles.title: Australia bids farewell to Andrew Symonds after car crash tragedy: 'Service was simply beautiful'
articles.description: Andrew Symonds was remembered as a supremely talented cricketer with "a pure heart" at a memorial service on Friday for the Australian former all-rounder who died aged 46.
articles.content:
